title: AWS Solutions Architect

company.name: CGI Morocco
company.description: Canadian IT consulting and systems integration company

description: Join us as a AWS Solutions Architect to architect and implement cloud solutions. You will design scalable, secure, and cost-effective cloud infrastructure using industry best practices.
responsibilities: Ensure security and compliance in cloud environments
Optimize cloud costs and resource utilization
Provide technical guidance on cloud best practices
requirements: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field
Passion for technology and continuous learning
